mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id, m.order_num, m.path, m.component, m.menu_type, m.visible, m.perms, m.icon FROM menu m JOIN role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id JOIN role r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_role ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id JOIN user u ON ur.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND r.status = 1 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM menu m JOIN role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id JOIN role r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_role ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id JOIN user u ON ur.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND m.perms IS NOT NULL AND m.perms != '' AND r.status = 1 ORDER BY m.perms
